website_summaries.verdict: A dressy shoe, but not durable enough for all occasions.
pros: Designed to mimic barefoot walking, which helps young walkers
Leather upper, hook-and-loop closure, cushioned collar and padded insole
cons: Gives some children blisters when worn without socks

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed up in 3 days!!
customer_reviews.text: These scuff very easily. My toddler of 15 months wore these and after 3 days they were all scuffed up. I am surprised because I have never had this happen with this brand and all of my three children have wore this brand. I am disappointed. Won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable, and don't compress his feet
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased these shoes (because my baby has been loving his others for 3 months - a little too much). They are excellently wide, and comfortable, and don't compress his feet. They are also stiff enough to curb his tippy-toe walking a bit (though he sometimes manages to get that on even with the shoes). Loves running about just fine in these. I think they look very classy.
customer_reviews.author: TechnicalMongoose

customer_reviews.title: It is deceiving. Compare the picture on the website and the photos I posted below before buying.
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the amazon website and the shoes I received today doesn’t match. Wrong color. The metal button on top of the valcoro is missing from the pair I received. It has strong unpleasant odor. I have attached the picture of it so that you can compare easily.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Goes with everything, a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are somewhat narrow but they are absolutely awesome summer shoes for my son! He had just started walking and had no problem in them! They go with everything, easy Velcro on and off, and I will continue to buy them next summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fisherman sandal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect summer shoe , great fitting wide shoe! Had been searching for a wide leather soft bottom shoe for my 2 year old grandson. This is perfect! Classic leather sandal, non skid sole, Velcro buckle, great fit! The double wide was all that was left in his size, fits him great. He wears crocks because of wide foot, these work beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. I bought this sandal for my great ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I bought this sandal for my great nephew and it's true to size. He's one year old, tall and has big feet like his dad. They look adorable on him and are very safe, since he runs around like a crazy person!😁
customer_reviews.author: DASMEE RAMDIAL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals. My grandson really like them. We do too
customer_reviews.author: bruticus6

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality shoe for boys with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shoe for boys with wide feet. i like that you can see his foot in the shoe to get an idea of the fit
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My sons loves this shoes that he refuses to wear something else... he is one year old... even when it is chilly, he wants to wear it... so I am assuming they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: cali

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals that come in extra wide widths
customer_reviews.text: Our family has wide feet. Love these sandals that come in extra wide widths. They are really cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: Yraiym

customer_reviews.title: I buys these sandals every year for my twin boys ...
customer_reviews.text: I buys these sandals every year for my twin boys, age 2. One of them has an extra wide foot and these sandals fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far. My daughter's first real pair of shoes. I know thy will last for future children as well
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Toddler Boys Harper Sandal
feature_bullets: rubber pods on outsole for traction
alternative closure for easy on/off and adjustability
memory foam insole for enhanced comfort
lightweight EVA outsole for maximum flexibility
mesh linings with anti-microbial treatment reduces odor
